import {Fragment} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Cart({cartItems,setCartItems}){ function increaseQty(item){ if(item.product.stock==item.qty){ return } cartItems.map((i)=>{ if(i.product._id==item.product._id){ i.qty++ } return i }) } function decreaseQty(){ if(item.qty>1){ setQty((state)=>state-1) } } return

Your Cart: {cartItems.length} items

{cartItems.map((item)=>(
{item.product.name}

{item.product.price}

decreaseQty(item)}>- increaseQty(item)}>+
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

}
